resources.string: Don\'t have an account? Sign Up now

Create your FoodRunner Account, Login into the account, search for the hotel you wish to review, and then “write the review” into the box named same. You can also give the ratings to the hotel over there. And then select Publish Review. Peace !

For delivery agents, the bone of contention is a revision in the way FoodRunner calculates payment for deliveries based on distance. For orders up to 5.5 kilometres, the company would pay a flat rate of Rs 30 and an additional Rs 10 for every km beyond that.

FoodRunner has introduced “on time or free delivery” — meaning, if a consumer opts to pay an additional Rs 10 on select restaurants, he/she is guaranteed free order if it is not delivered within the promised time.

To begin with, through its food delivery business,Food Runner charges a commission to the restaurants on the basis of orders. While users pay a delivery fee,FoodRunner earns through restaurants who pay a commission for each delivery, which is then split among the delivery partner and the company.

Very late to the game, FoodRunner started their online food delivery service. Different from other players like Swiggy, FoodRunner does not have their own delivery system, they let users place the order through the website or the app and the restaurant fulfil that order through by their own.
(The OTP email would be sent only once in 24 hours. Hence, if you need to reset the password multiple times within 24 hours kindly use the same OTP)
